ingredients.ingredient: ⅓ cup Calabrian chili peppers in oil
2 tablespoons olive oil, or more as needed
¼ cup butter, at room temperature

cookingTips: Cook pancetta until crispy before processing for better texture
Use room temperature butter to blend smoothly with other ingredients
Process to desired consistency—chunkier for rustic, smoother for spreadable
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you balance the umami from salami with the heat from Calabrian peppers?
